actions.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment establishes an Office of Energy Employment and Training to ensure that veterans, women, and underrepresented minorities are fully included in the hiring and training efforts of the Department of the Interior's energy planning, permitting, and regulatory agencies.
purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in House Report 113-493 to establish an Office of Energy Employment and Training to ensure that veterans, women, and underrepresented minorities are fully included in the hiring and training efforts of the Department of the Interior's energy planning, permitting, and regulatory agencies.
